title: 145 - Roux the Day
description:
Tim and Heather are darn near driven to bankruptcy by an extra order of guac. The gang has a classic Hawkins playlist session, in which Luke is particularly affected by Heather’s least favorite song in the universe. Livy sings a traditional Irish folk ballad (chaos ensues because there’s no vocal guitar). Jackson calls in to say hello, and don’t worry, he probably got the job! 


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
